data.eml:eml: A new species of genus Eulimnadia Packard, 1874 (Branchiopoda: Spinicaudata: Limnadiidae) from India with an updated key for some Indian species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Padhye, Sameer M., Rabet, Nicolas, Kulkarni, Mihir R., Pagni, Marco (2018): A new species of genus Eulimnadia Packard, 1874 (Branchiopoda: Spinicaudata: Limnadiidae) from India with an updated key for some Indian species. Zootaxa 4399 (3): 341-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4399.3.4
